name: Christian Mpabuka
bio: I'm a full stack Web developer, with experience primarily in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Django, Vite,ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Mongoose, MongoDB, SQL, Git & Github. For the past 5 years was working as a computer technician, Where I was able to understand the architecture behind the computer hardware and I was able to train other technicians. I have been programming as an hobby for a couple of years and I recently rekindled this passion. I seek a role a web developer where I can learn, grow, and continue to master this passion.
